title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
After a thrilling Monday Night Football matchup between the Rams and Cardinals, Colin believes Matthew Stafford is finally feeling comfortable in LA as they prepare for the playoffs. He discusses the slumping Cowboys offense and why QB Dak Prescott is a product of his environment. He also unveils his top 10 NFL teams in the Herd Hierarchy after week 14 of the NFL season. Plus, Fox Sports NFL analyst Mark Sanchez joins the show to talk about Odell Beckham Jr.’s growth since coming to the Rams.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
